texts.definition: Location in game worlds where players can on their own do transactions or receive services.
markups: <style="Definition">Location in game worlds where players can on their own do transactions or receive services.</style>

In games where players control characters inhabiting game worlds, they may have need of various services such as trading, healing, or training. <style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> are places where players can go to get these services and can handle the interaction as if using a vending machine.

Many <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Category:Computer-based%20Roleplaying%20Games">Computer-based Roleplaying Games</link></style>, e.g.  the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Witcher%20series">Witcher series</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/World%20of%20Warcraft">World of Warcraft</link></style>, and the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Dragon%20Age%20series">Dragon Age series</link></style>, have vendors selling the various items players need and sell the superfluous ones. These vendors are shown as non-player characters but cannot be killed or otherwise interacted with except to trade and talk. In contrast, most places where one can buy and sell things in the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Fallout%20series">Fallout series</link></style> are run by non-player characters that can be killed, but the ''Vendortron'' robot outside of Freeside in <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Fallout:%20New%20Vegas">Fallout: New Vegas</link></style> qualifies as a <style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosk</style> since it is built into a kiosk and cannot be attacked.

<style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> are also found in more action-oriented computer games. There are various non-player characters in <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Torchlight">Torchlight</link></style>, including in the dungeons, that function as <style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> since they cannot be hurt or killed. The earlier <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Diablo%20series">Diablo series</link></style> also contain such non-player characters and does <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Borderlands">Borderlands</link></style>. The <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Grand%20Theft%20Auto%20series">Grand Theft Auto series</link></style> have several establishments that function as <style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style>, some which have to be entered by foot (e.g. cloth and weapon stores) and some which have to be entered while driving a vehicle (e.g. body shops).

<style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> provide specified services at specified locations in <style="Link"><link="game-boards">Game Boards</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="game-worlds">Game Worlds</link></style>, or <style="Link"><link="levels">Levels</link></style>, so designing these consist of choosing what services should be available and where they should be available.

The most common types of services provided by <style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> are <style="Link"><link="trading">Trading</link></style> (by having <style="Link"><link="transferable-items">Transferable Items</link></style> associated with them), receiving <style="Link"><link="quests">Quests</link></style>, and hearing <style="Link"><link="gossip">Gossip</link></style>. Other examples include training <style="Link"><link="skills">Skills</link></style> and repairing <style="Link"><link="game-items">Game Items</link></style> that suffer from <style="Link"><link="deterioration">Deterioration</link></style>.

For services that may have <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Limited%20Resources">Limited Resources</link></style>, e.g. <style="Link"><link="trading">Trading</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="quests">Quests</link></style>, an option is to periodically refill the kiosks by making them into

Some <style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> are represented as <style="Link"><link="non-player-characters">Non-Player Characters</link></style> in the role of <style="Link"><link="helpers">Helpers</link></style>; showing that not all <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/NPCs">NPCs</link></style> are <style="Link"><link="characters">Characters</link></style>.

Since they can provide <style="Link"><link="quests">Quests</link></style>, <style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> can help move <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Predefined%20Story%20Structures">Predefined Story Structures</link></style> forward. They can also be <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Predefined%20Story%20Structures">Predefined Story Structures</link></style> in their own right.

<style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> provide <style="Link"><link="strategic-locations">Strategic Locations</link></style> in <style="Link"><link="game-boards">Game Boards</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="game-worlds">Game Worlds</link></style>, or <style="Link"><link="levels">Levels</link></style> by the <style="Link"><link="location-fixed-abilities">Location-Fixed Abilities</link></style> they provide. When <style="Link"><link="game-items">Game Items</link></style> or <style="Link"><link="quests">Quests</link></style> offered at them replenish, they are also <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Resource%20Generators">Resource Generators</link></style>.

<style="CurrentLink">Self-Service Kiosks</style> are <style="Link"><link="installations">Installations</link></style> since they provide actions to players (to access the services), and due to this they are in a way <style="Link"><link="tools">Tools</link></style> also.

<style="Link"><link="gossip">Gossip</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="helpers">Helpers</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="installations">Installations</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="location-fixed-abilities">Location-Fixed Abilities</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="non-player-characters">Non-Player Characters</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="quests">Quests</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Predefined%20Story%20Structures">Predefined Story Structures</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Resource%20Generators">Resource Generators</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="strategic-locations">Strategic Locations</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="trading">Trading</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="tools">Tools</link></style>
